titles: By the King. A proclamation of His Majesties grace, favour, and pardon to the inhabitants of his county of his citty of Exceter.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
notes: "Given at Our court at Maydenhead, this ninth day of November, in the eighteenth yeare of Our reigne."
With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Place and date of imprint from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Pardons --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
